item.description:
Hello everyone - this is the first event of the Boston Nightlife Meetup Group - hope you can make it! Feel free to pass along this message.

We will meet at Caprice at 9pm by the first floor lounge area. I will post a picture on here so you can at least identify a familiar face.

Note that this is a Thursday night - I am flexible about timing and venues for future events, so please send me your ideas.

Thanks and see you there!

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Night Life September Meetup
